snippet: Citing the potential impact on public health, a moratorium was ordered on the expansion of oil processing facilities at the Port of Albany.
abstract: Albany County Executive Daniel P McCoy orders surprise moratorium on the expansion of oil processing facilities in the Port of Albany; action effectively freezes plans by Global Partners to build seven new heating units until an investigation is conducted; McCoy cites potential impact on public health of city's growing role as an oil hub.
lead_paragraph: Citing the potential impact on public health, a moratorium was ordered on the expansion of oil processing facilities at the Port of Albany.

headline.main: Albany County Orders a Halt to Growth in Oil Processing
headline.print_headline: Albany County Orders a Halt to Growth in Oil Processing
